Posts.Content: Jan 18, 2010 07:51AM Lynh wrote: Oh Magister, I can't imagine having them for four weeks.  I logged in to search the forum for info about drains because mine are driving me crazy after 10 days.  I tried some neosporin and that seemed to relieve the soreness some.  A friend told me to limit my activity to limit the draining.  She said that woked for her. Hopefully someone will have some pointers for you.   Lyn
